name: SolarWalk
description:
The zip contains the game executable, some game data thingy, and some license that YoYo Games includes with their GameMaker Studio 2 builds apparently.

Build Notes:

- There is a known issue with touchpads. Some players may not be able to shoot and move at the same time or, in the most extreme cases, not shoot at all.

This game uses modified versions of these sounds from freesound:

90's Game Loop by furbyguy ( https://www.freesound.org/people/furbyguy/sounds/388101/ )

Zap by cabled_mess ( https://www.freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/350914/ )

Pulse Rifle by Andromadax24 ( https://www.freesound.org/people/Andromadax24/sounds/169775/ )

Laser SFX compilations by cabled_mess ( https://www.freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/352704/ )
